page.title: 17ACTIVITIES AROUND GT.SUTTON
page.content: In{Great Sutton}there are many{clubs e.g. Brownies, Guides, Beavers, Cubs, and Scouts. There are{sports clubs where you can run, swim, play games like soccer, tennis, badminton, golf, squash, cricket or bowling. For the more agile there is available Karate, Ju-jitsu and Judo. Several{churches run their own clubs offering quieter activities such as flower arranging and bird watching. The{Arts}are not neglected in the area,music lovers can enjoy a choice of several choirs, silver bands and light opera companies. Dance is catered for in the form of tap, ballet and Morris dancing.
